Table of Contents

WHOAMI(1L) manual page

Name

whoami - print effective userid

Synopsis

whoami [--help] [--version]

Description

This manual page documents the GNU version of whoami. whoami prints the user name associated with the current effective user ID. It is equivalent to the command `id -un'.

Options

--help
Print a usage message on standard output and exit successfully.
--version
Print version information on standard output then exit successfully.
